collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (44 total Queries, 44 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT * FROM `tbl_position` WHERE `posID` = '1'

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>1</b>', '<b>Disaggregation of Information </b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 8.3 ', '1.1', 'If the entity discloses information about its operating segments on a voluntary basis, has it been ensured that this information is not described as ‘Segmental Information’ unless the provisions of IFRS 8 have been fully complied with?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>2</b>', '<b>Government Grants and Assistance</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 20.31', '2.1', 'Where an IFRS requires the separate disclosure of an item of income or expense, if that item has been affected by a government grant, then has the effect on that line in the SCI been disclosed?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 20.39 (b), (c) IAS 10.36 IAS 20.35 ', '2.2', 'Are the following disclosed: <ul> <li>The nature and amounts of government grants recognised in the financial statements;</li> <li>Unfulfilled conditions and other contingencies attaching to government grants that have been recognised in income;</li> <li>An indication of other forms of government assistance from which the entity has directly benefited?</li> </ul> <p>This disclosure does not apply to benefits that that arise in determining the amount of tax such as R&D tax credits etc.</p> <p>Examples would include free technical or marketing advice, the provision of guarantees and loans at nil or low interest rates.</p>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>3</b>', '<b>Information about Judgements</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.122', '3.1', 'If not already disclosed in the accounting policies, has management disclosed the key judgements made (apart from those involving estimations) in the process of applying the entity’s accounting policies and that have the most significant effect on the amounts recognised in the financial statements?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>4</b>', '<b>Information about Key Sources of Estimation Uncertainty</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.125 IAS 1.129 ', '4.1', 'Where, in determining the carrying amount of assets and liabilities there are material uncertainties, are the following disclosed: <ul> <li>The nature of the uncertainties;</li> <li>The carrying amount as at the end of the reporting period?</li> </ul> <p>Typical disclosures would include:</p> <ul> <li>The nature of the assumptions or other estimation uncertainty;</li> <li>The sensitivity of carrying amounts to the methods, assumptions and estimates underlying their calculation, including the reasons for the sensitivity;</li> <li>The expected resolution of an uncertainty and the range of possible outcomes within the next financial year in respect of the carrying amounts of the assets and liabilities; and</li> <li>An explanation of changes made to past assumptions concerning those assets and liabilities, if the uncertainty remains unresolved.</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>5</b>', '<b>Changes Since the Last Interim Financial Statements</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 34.26', '5.1', 'Where interim financial statements have been prepared, and amounts estimated in those interim financial statements have changed significantly, have the nature and amount of that change been disclosed?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>6</b>', '<b>Capitalisation of Borrowing Costs</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 23.26 (b)', '6.1', 'Has the capitalisation rate used been disclosed?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 23.26 (a)', '6.2', 'Has the amount of borrowing costs capitalised in the period been disclosed?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>7</b>', '<b>Contingent Liabilities</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 37.86 IAS 37.91 ', '7.1', 'Is the following information given in respect of each class of contingent liability (unless the possibility of any transfer in settlement is remote): <ul> <li>A brief description of their nature; and where practical: <ul> <li>an estimate of their financial effect;</li> <li>an indication of the uncertainties relating to the amount or timing of any outflows; and</li> <li>the possibility of any reimbursement?</li> </ul> </li> </ul> <p>If it is impracticable to make one or more of these disclosures, that fact must be stated.</p>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 37.88', '7.2', 'Where a provision and a contingent liability arise from the same set of circumstances, have they been disclosed in a way that shows the link between the two?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>8</b>', '<b>Contingent Assets </b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 37.89 IAS 37.91 IAS 37.90 ', '8.1', 'Is the following information given in respect of each class of contingent asset (where the likely inflow of economic benefit is probable (i.e. more likely than not)): <ul> <li>the nature of the contingent asset; and where practical:</li> <li>an estimate of their financial effect.</li> </ul> <p>If it is impracticable to make this disclosure, that fact must be stated.</p> <p>It is vital that disclosure of contingent assets avoids giving a misleading indication of the likelihood of income arising.</p>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>9</b>', '<b>Non-Disclosure of Contingents Assets or Liabilities (Re: Seriously Prejudicial)</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 37.92', '9.1', 'The disclosures noted in 7.1 and 8.1 above do not have to be provided if deemed to be seriously prejudicial (unless required by statute). <p>If advantage is taken of this exemption, have the following been disclosed:</p> <ul> <li>The general nature of the dispute; </li> <li>The fact that full disclosure has not been given, and</li> <li>The reason why the required information is not disclosed?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>10</b>', '<b>Capital and Other Commitments</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 16.74 (c) ', '10.1', 'Has the amount of any contractual commitments for the acquisition of PPE been disclosed?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.75 (h)', '10.2', 'Regarding Investment Properties, has the amount of any contractual commitments regarding the following been disclosed: <ul> <li>Purchase;</li> <li>Construction;</li> <li>Development;</li> <li>Repairs;</li> <li>Maintenance; or</li> <li>Enhancements?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>11</b>', '<b>Events after the End of the Reporting Period</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 10.32', '11.1', 'Are the following disclosures made in respect of non-adjusting events: <ul> <li>The nature of the event; and</li> <li>An estimate of the financial effect (or a statement that such an estimate cannot be made)?</li> </ul> <p>NB: A non-adjusting event is an event after the reporting date, which concerns conditions that arose after the reporting date. Examples, are given in IAS 10, paragraph 22.</p>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.76', '11.2', 'Where loans have been classified as current liabilities, however, during the period between the reporting date and the date of signing the financial statements, any of the following events occurred, are they disclosed as non-adjusting events: <ul> <li>Refinancing on a long-term basis;</li> <li>Rectification of a breach of a long-term loan arrangement; and</li> <li>The granting by the lender of a period of grace to rectify a breach of a long-term loan arrangement ending at least twelve months after the reporting period?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 12.88', '11.3', 'Where a change in tax rates or law are enacted or announced after the reporting period, has the effect on current and deferred tax assets and liabilities been disclosed?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRIC 17.17', '11.4', 'If, after the end of a reporting period, but before the financial statements are authorised for issue, an entity declares a dividend in specie, it shall disclose: <ul> <li>the nature of the asset to be distributed;</li> <li>the carrying amount of the asset to be distributed as of the end of the reporting period; and</li> <li>the fair value of the asset to be distributed as of the end of the reporting period, if it is different from its carrying amount, and the information about the method(s) used to measure that fair value required by IFRS 13, paragraphs 93(b), (d), (g) and (i) and 99?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>12</b>', '<b>Dividends</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.107. IAS 1.137 (a) IAS 10.13 IAS 1.137 (b) ', '12.1', 'Are the following disclosed: <ul> <li>The amount of dividend recognised as a distribution to owners (i.e. equity dividends) and the related amount of dividend per share;</li> <li>The amount of dividends proposed or declared before the financial statements were authorised for issue but not recognised as a distribution to owners during the period, and the related amount per share; and</li> <li>The amount of any cumulative preference dividends not recognised?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>13</b>', '<b>Ultimate Controlling Party and Parent Undertakings Disclosures </b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.138 (c ) IAS 24.13', '13.1', 'Do the notes disclose who: <ul> <li>The ultimate controlling party is;</li> <li>The immediate parent undertaking is;</li> <li>The ultimate parent undertaking is?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 24.13', '13.2', 'If neither the entity’s parent, nor the ultimate controlling party produces consolidated financial statements available for public use, has the name of the next most senior parent that does been disclosed?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('Best Practice', '13.3', 'Where the parent undertaking or ultimate controlling party has changed since the reporting date, has this been disclosed?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>14</b>', '<b>Related Party Disclosures</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 24.18', '14.1', 'Where related party transaction exist have the following been disclosed (as a <b>minimum</b>): <ul> <li>The amount of the transactions;</li> <li>The amount of outstanding balances (including commitments);</li> <li>Regarding the outstanding balance (including commitments), have the terms and conditions been disclosed, including:</li> <li>Whether the balances are secured;</li> <li>The nature of the consideration to be provided in settlement;</li> <li>Details of whether any guarantees were given or received.</li> <li>Provisions regarding outstanding debit balances; and</li> <li>The bad debt expense recognised during the period?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 24.18A IAS 24.24 IAS 24.19 IAS 24.20', '14.2', 'Have amounts incurred by the entity for the provision of key management services that are provided by a separate management entity been separately disclosed? <p>Unless separate disclosure is needed to understand the effects of related party transactions, transactions which are similar in nature can be aggregated where they relate to similar related parties.</p> <p>IAS 24 requires separate disclosure for each of the following categories of related party, has this disclosure been given:</p> <ul> <li>The parent;</li> <li>Entities with joint control or significant influence over the entity;</li> <li>Subsidiaries;</li> <li>Associates;</li> <li>Joint ventures in which the entity is a joint venturer;</li> <li>Key management personnel of the entity or its parent; and</li> <li>Other related parties?</li> </ul> <p>NB: Regarding similar transactions, IAS 24 gives the following examples where aggregation could occur:</p> <ul> <li>Purchases or sales of goods (finished or unfinished); </li> <li>Purchases or sales of property and other assets;</li> <li>Rendering or receiving services;</li> <li>Leases;</li> <li>Transfers of R&D;</li> <li>Transfers under licence agreements;</li> <li>Transfers under finance agreements (including loans and equity contributions in the form of cash or in kind);</li> <li>Provision of guarantees or collateral;</li> <li>Commitments to do something if a particular event occurs or does not occur in the future, including executory contracts (recognised and unrecognised);</li> <li>Settlement of liabilities on behalf of the entity or on behalf of another party; and</li> <li>Participation by a parent or subsidiary in a defined benefit plan where risks are shared between group entities</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 24.25', '', '<b>Government-Related Entities and Related Party Disclosures</b> <p>A reporting entity is exempt from disclosing related party transactions and balances (including commitments) with:</p> <ul> <li>A government that has control or joint control of; or significant influence over the reporting entity; and</li> <li>Another entity that is a related party because the same government has control or joint control of, or significant influence over, both the reporting entity and the other entity.</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 24.26', '14.3', 'Where these exemptions are taken advantage of, are the following disclosed: <ul> <li>The name of the government;</li> <li>The nature of the relationship; and</li> <li>The following information in sufficient detail to enable users of the entity’s financial statement to understand the effect of related party transactions including:- <ul> <li>The nature and amount of each individually significant transactions; and</li> <li>For other transactions that are collectively, but not individually significant, a qualitative or quantitative indication of their extent?</li> </ul> </li> </ul> <p>IAS 24.27 gives additional guidance.</p>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>15</b>', '<b>Capital Management</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.134 IAS 1.135 IAS 1.136', '15.1', 'Has adequate disclosure been given to allow an evaluation of the entity’s objectives, policies and processes for managing capital? <p>To comply with IAS 1, paragraph 134, the following disclosures should be given:</p> <ol type=\"a\"> <li>A description of what the entity manages as capital;</li> <li>When an entity is subject to externally imposed capital requirements, the nature of those requirements and how those requirements are incorporated into the management of capital;</li> <li>How it is meeting its objectives for managing capital;</li> <li>Summary quantitative data about what it manages as capital;</li> <li>Any changes in (a) to (d) from the previous period;</li> <li>Whether, during the period, externally imposed capital requirements were complied with and where not, the consequences of such non-compliance.</li> </ol> <p>NB: These disclosures should be based on the information provided internally to key management personnel</p> <p>NB: Where an entity has a number of different ways of measuring capital or is subject to a number of different external capital requirement, information may only be given on an aggregate basis if it would still be meaningful.</p>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 20.39 (b), (c) IAS 10.36 IAS 20.35 ', '2.2', 'Are the following disclosed: <ul> <li>The nature and amounts of government grants recognised in the financial statements;</li> <li>Unfulfilled conditions and other contingencies attaching to government grants that have been recognised in income;</li> <li>An indication of other forms of government assistance from which the entity has directly benefited?</li> </ul> <p>This disclosure does not apply to benefits that that arise in determining the amount of tax such as R&D tax credits etc.</p> <p>Examples would include free technical or marketing advice, the provision of guarantees and loans at nil or low interest rates.</p>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>4</b>', '<b>Information about Key Sources of Estimation Uncertainty</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.125 IAS 1.129 ', '4.1', 'Where, in determining the carrying amount of assets and liabilities there are material uncertainties, are the following disclosed: <ul> <li>The nature of the uncertainties;</li> <li>The carrying amount as at the end of the reporting period?</li> </ul> <p>Typical disclosures would include:</p> <ul> <li>The nature of the assumptions or other estimation uncertainty;</li> <li>The sensitivity of carrying amounts to the methods, assumptions and estimates underlying their calculation, including the reasons for the sensitivity;</li> <li>The expected resolution of an uncertainty and the range of possible outcomes within the next financial year in respect of the carrying amounts of the assets and liabilities; and</li> <li>An explanation of changes made to past assumptions concerning those assets and liabilities, if the uncertainty remains unresolved.</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>5</b>', '<b>Changes Since the Last Interim Financial Statements</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 34.26', '5.1', 'Where interim financial statements have been prepared, and amounts estimated in those interim financial statements have changed significantly, have the nature and amount of that change been disclosed?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>6</b>', '<b>Capitalisation of Borrowing Costs</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 23.26 (b)', '6.1', 'Has the capitalisation rate used been disclosed?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 23.26 (a)', '6.2', 'Has the amount of borrowing costs capitalised in the period been disclosed?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>7</b>', '<b>Contingent Liabilities</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 37.86 IAS 37.91 ', '7.1', 'Is the following information given in respect of each class of contingent liability (unless the possibility of any transfer in settlement is remote): <ul> <li>A brief description of their nature; and where practical: <ul> <li>an estimate of their financial effect;</li> <li>an indication of the uncertainties relating to the amount or timing of any outflows; and</li> <li>the possibility of any reimbursement?</li> </ul> </li> </ul> <p>If it is impracticable to make one or more of these disclosures, that fact must be stated.</p>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 37.88', '7.2', 'Where a provision and a contingent liability arise from the same set of circumstances, have they been disclosed in a way that shows the link between the two?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>8</b>', '<b>Contingent Assets </b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 37.89 IAS 37.91 IAS 37.90 ', '8.1', 'Is the following information given in respect of each class of contingent asset (where the likely inflow of economic benefit is probable (i.e. more likely than not)): <ul> <li>the nature of the contingent asset; and where practical:</li> <li>an estimate of their financial effect.</li> </ul> <p>If it is impracticable to make this disclosure, that fact must be stated.</p> <p>It is vital that disclosure of contingent assets avoids giving a misleading indication of the likelihood of income arising.</p>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>9</b>', '<b>Non-Disclosure of Contingents Assets or Liabilities (Re: Seriously Prejudicial)</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 37.92', '9.1', 'The disclosures noted in 7.1 and 8.1 above do not have to be provided if deemed to be seriously prejudicial (unless required by statute). <p>If advantage is taken of this exemption, have the following been disclosed:</p> <ul> <li>The general nature of the dispute; </li> <li>The fact that full disclosure has not been given, and</li> <li>The reason why the required information is not disclosed?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>10</b>', '<b>Capital and Other Commitments</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 16.74 (c) ', '10.1', 'Has the amount of any contractual commitments for the acquisition of PPE been disclosed?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.75 (h)', '10.2', 'Regarding Investment Properties, has the amount of any contractual commitments regarding the following been disclosed: <ul> <li>Purchase;</li> <li>Construction;</li> <li>Development;</li> <li>Repairs;</li> <li>Maintenance; or</li> <li>Enhancements?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>11</b>', '<b>Events after the End of the Reporting Period</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 10.32', '11.1', 'Are the following disclosures made in respect of non-adjusting events: <ul> <li>The nature of the event; and</li> <li>An estimate of the financial effect (or a statement that such an estimate cannot be made)?</li> </ul> <p>NB: A non-adjusting event is an event after the reporting date, which concerns conditions that arose after the reporting date. Examples, are given in IAS 10, paragraph 22.</p>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.76', '11.2', 'Where loans have been classified as current liabilities, however, during the period between the reporting date and the date of signing the financial statements, any of the following events occurred, are they disclosed as non-adjusting events: <ul> <li>Refinancing on a long-term basis;</li> <li>Rectification of a breach of a long-term loan arrangement; and</li> <li>The granting by the lender of a period of grace to rectify a breach of a long-term loan arrangement ending at least twelve months after the reporting period?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 12.88', '11.3', 'Where a change in tax rates or law are enacted or announced after the reporting period, has the effect on current and deferred tax assets and liabilities been disclosed?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRIC 17.17', '11.4', 'If, after the end of a reporting period, but before the financial statements are authorised for issue, an entity declares a dividend in specie, it shall disclose: <ul> <li>the nature of the asset to be distributed;</li> <li>the carrying amount of the asset to be distributed as of the end of the reporting period; and</li> <li>the fair value of the asset to be distributed as of the end of the reporting period, if it is different from its carrying amount, and the information about the method(s) used to measure that fair value required by IFRS 13, paragraphs 93(b), (d), (g) and (i) and 99?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>12</b>', '<b>Dividends</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.107. IAS 1.137 (a) IAS 10.13 IAS 1.137 (b) ', '12.1', 'Are the following disclosed: <ul> <li>The amount of dividend recognised as a distribution to owners (i.e. equity dividends) and the related amount of dividend per share;</li> <li>The amount of dividends proposed or declared before the financial statements were authorised for issue but not recognised as a distribution to owners during the period, and the related amount per share; and</li> <li>The amount of any cumulative preference dividends not recognised?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>13</b>', '<b>Ultimate Controlling Party and Parent Undertakings Disclosures </b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.138 (c ) IAS 24.13', '13.1', 'Do the notes disclose who: <ul> <li>The ultimate controlling party is;</li> <li>The immediate parent undertaking is;</li> <li>The ultimate parent undertaking is?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 24.13', '13.2', 'If neither the entity’s parent, nor the ultimate controlling party produces consolidated financial statements available for public use, has the name of the next most senior parent that does been disclosed?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('Best Practice', '13.3', 'Where the parent undertaking or ultimate controlling party has changed since the reporting date, has this been disclosed?', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>14</b>', '<b>Related Party Disclosures</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 24.18', '14.1', 'Where related party transaction exist have the following been disclosed (as a <b>minimum</b>): <ul> <li>The amount of the transactions;</li> <li>The amount of outstanding balances (including commitments);</li> <li>Regarding the outstanding balance (including commitments), have the terms and conditions been disclosed, including:</li> <li>Whether the balances are secured;</li> <li>The nature of the consideration to be provided in settlement;</li> <li>Details of whether any guarantees were given or received.</li> <li>Provisions regarding outstanding debit balances; and</li> <li>The bad debt expense recognised during the period?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 24.18A IAS 24.24 IAS 24.19 IAS 24.20', '14.2', 'Have amounts incurred by the entity for the provision of key management services that are provided by a separate management entity been separately disclosed? <p>Unless separate disclosure is needed to understand the effects of related party transactions, transactions which are similar in nature can be aggregated where they relate to similar related parties.</p> <p>IAS 24 requires separate disclosure for each of the following categories of related party, has this disclosure been given:</p> <ul> <li>The parent;</li> <li>Entities with joint control or significant influence over the entity;</li> <li>Subsidiaries;</li> <li>Associates;</li> <li>Joint ventures in which the entity is a joint venturer;</li> <li>Key management personnel of the entity or its parent; and</li> <li>Other related parties?</li> </ul> <p>NB: Regarding similar transactions, IAS 24 gives the following examples where aggregation could occur:</p> <ul> <li>Purchases or sales of goods (finished or unfinished); </li> <li>Purchases or sales of property and other assets;</li> <li>Rendering or receiving services;</li> <li>Leases;</li> <li>Transfers of R&D;</li> <li>Transfers under licence agreements;</li> <li>Transfers under finance agreements (including loans and equity contributions in the form of cash or in kind);</li> <li>Provision of guarantees or collateral;</li> <li>Commitments to do something if a particular event occurs or does not occur in the future, including executory contracts (recognised and unrecognised);</li> <li>Settlement of liabilities on behalf of the entity or on behalf of another party; and</li> <li>Participation by a parent or subsidiary in a defined benefit plan where risks are shared between group entities</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 24.25', '', '<b>Government-Related Entities and Related Party Disclosures</b> <p>A reporting entity is exempt from disclosing related party transactions and balances (including commitments) with:</p> <ul> <li>A government that has control or joint control of; or significant influence over the reporting entity; and</li> <li>Another entity that is a related party because the same government has control or joint control of, or significant influence over, both the reporting entity and the other entity.</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 24.26', '14.3', 'Where these exemptions are taken advantage of, are the following disclosed: <ul> <li>The name of the government;</li> <li>The nature of the relationship; and</li> <li>The following information in sufficient detail to enable users of the entity’s financial statement to understand the effect of related party transactions including:- <ul> <li>The nature and amount of each individually significant transactions; and</li> <li>For other transactions that are collectively, but not individually significant, a qualitative or quantitative indication of their extent?</li> </ul> </li> </ul> <p>IAS 24.27 gives additional guidance.</p>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>15</b>', '<b>Capital Management</b>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.134 IAS 1.135 IAS 1.136', '15.1', 'Has adequate disclosure been given to allow an evaluation of the entity’s objectives, policies and processes for managing capital? <p>To comply with IAS 1, paragraph 134, the following disclosures should be given:</p> <ol type=\"a\"> <li>A description of what the entity manages as capital;</li> <li>When an entity is subject to externally imposed capital requirements, the nature of those requirements and how those requirements are incorporated into the management of capital;</li> <li>How it is meeting its objectives for managing capital;</li> <li>Summary quantitative data about what it manages as capital;</li> <li>Any changes in (a) to (d) from the previous period;</li> <li>Whether, during the period, externally imposed capital requirements were complied with and where not, the consequences of such non-compliance.</li> </ol> <p>NB: These disclosures should be based on the information provided internally to key management personnel</p> <p>NB: Where an entity has a number of different ways of measuring capital or is subject to a number of different external capital requirement, information may only be given on an aggregate basis if it would still be meaningful.</p>', '', '', 'section9', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 18:14:50')

post.question:
Array
(
    [0] => <b>Disaggregation of Information </b>
    [1] => If the entity discloses information about its operating segments on a voluntary basis, has it been ensured that this information is not described as ‘Segmental Information’ unless the provisions of IFRS 8 have been fully complied with?
    [2] => <b>Government Grants and Assistance</b>
    [3] => Where an IFRS requires the separate disclosure of an item of income or expense, if that item has been affected by a government grant, then has the effect on that line in the SCI been disclosed?
    [4] => Are the following disclosed:
<ul>
    <li>The nature and amounts of government grants recognised in the financial statements;</li>
    <li>Unfulfilled conditions and other contingencies attaching to government grants that have been recognised in income;</li>
    <li>An indication of other forms of government assistance from which the entity has directly benefited?</li>
</ul>
<p>This disclosure does not apply to benefits that that arise in determining the amount of tax such as R&D tax credits etc.</p>
<p>Examples would include free technical or marketing advice, the provision of guarantees and loans at nil or low interest rates.</p>
    [5] => <b>Information about Judgements</b>
    [6] => If not already disclosed in the accounting policies, has management disclosed the key judgements made (apart from those involving estimations) in the process of applying the entity’s accounting policies and that have the most significant effect on the amounts recognised in the financial statements?
    [7] => <b>Information about Key Sources of Estimation Uncertainty</b>
    [8] => Where, in determining the carrying amount of assets and liabilities there are material uncertainties, are the following disclosed:
<ul>
    <li>The nature of the uncertainties;</li>
    <li>The carrying amount as at the end of the reporting period?</li>
</ul>
<p>Typical disclosures would include:</p>
<ul>
    <li>The nature of the assumptions or other estimation uncertainty;</li>
    <li>The sensitivity of carrying amounts to the methods, assumptions and estimates underlying their calculation, including the reasons for the sensitivity;</li>
    <li>The expected resolution of an uncertainty and the range of possible outcomes within the next financial year in respect of the carrying amounts of the assets and liabilities; and</li>
    <li>An explanation of changes made to past assumptions concerning those assets and liabilities, if the uncertainty remains unresolved.</li>
</ul>
    [9] => <b>Changes Since the Last Interim Financial Statements</b>
    [10] => Where interim financial statements have been prepared, and amounts estimated in those interim financial statements have changed significantly, have the nature and amount of that change been disclosed?
    [11] => <b>Capitalisation of Borrowing Costs</b>
    [12] => Has the capitalisation rate used been disclosed?
    [13] => Has the amount of borrowing costs capitalised in the period been disclosed?
    [14] => <b>Contingent Liabilities</b>
    [15] => Is the following information given in respect of each class of contingent liability (unless the possibility of any transfer in settlement is remote):
<ul>
    <li>A brief description of their nature; and where practical:
        <ul>
            <li>an estimate of their financial effect;</li>
            <li>an indication of the uncertainties relating to the amount or timing of any outflows; and</li>
            <li>the possibility of any reimbursement?</li>
        </ul>
    </li>
</ul>
<p>If it is impracticable to make one or more of these disclosures, that fact must be stated.</p>
    [16] => Where a provision and a contingent liability arise from the same set of circumstances, have they been disclosed in a way that shows the link between the two?
    [17] => <b>Contingent Assets </b>
    [18] => Is the following information given in respect of each class of contingent asset (where the likely inflow of economic benefit is probable (i.e. more likely than not)):
<ul>
    <li>the nature of the contingent asset; and where practical:</li>
    <li>an estimate of their financial effect.</li>
</ul>
<p>If it is impracticable to make this disclosure, that fact must be stated.</p>
<p>It is vital that disclosure of contingent assets avoids giving a misleading indication of the likelihood of income arising.</p>
    [19] => <b>Non-Disclosure of Contingents Assets or Liabilities (Re: Seriously Prejudicial)</b>
    [20] => The disclosures noted in 7.1 and 8.1 above do not have to be provided if deemed to be seriously prejudicial (unless required by statute).
<p>If advantage is taken of this exemption, have the following been disclosed:</p>
<ul>
    <li>The general nature of the dispute; </li>
    <li>The fact that full disclosure has not been given, and</li>
    <li>The reason why the required information is not disclosed?</li>
</ul>
    [21] => <b>Capital and Other Commitments</b>
    [22] => Has the amount of any contractual commitments for the acquisition of PPE been disclosed?
    [23] => Regarding Investment Properties, has the amount of any contractual commitments regarding the following been disclosed:
<ul>
    <li>Purchase;</li>
    <li>Construction;</li>
    <li>Development;</li>
    <li>Repairs;</li>
    <li>Maintenance; or</li>
    <li>Enhancements?</li>
</ul>
    [24] => <b>Events after the End of the Reporting Period</b>
    [25] => Are the following disclosures made in respect of non-adjusting events:
<ul>
    <li>The nature of the event; and</li>
    <li>An estimate of the financial effect (or a statement that such an estimate cannot be made)?</li>
</ul>
<p>NB: A non-adjusting event is an event after the reporting date, which concerns conditions that arose after the reporting date.  Examples, are given in IAS 10, paragraph 22.</p>
    [26] => Where loans have been classified as current liabilities, however, during the period between the reporting date and the date of signing the financial statements, any of the following events occurred, are they disclosed as non-adjusting events:
<ul>
    <li>Refinancing on a long-term basis;</li>
    <li>Rectification of a breach of a long-term loan arrangement; and</li>
    <li>The granting by the lender of a period of grace to rectify a breach of a long-term loan arrangement ending at least twelve months after the reporting period?</li>
</ul>
    [27] => Where a change in tax rates or law are enacted or announced after the reporting period, has the effect on current and deferred tax assets and liabilities been disclosed?
    [28] => If, after the end of a reporting period, but before the financial statements are authorised for issue, an entity declares a dividend in specie, it shall disclose:
<ul>
    <li>the nature of the asset to be distributed;</li>
    <li>the carrying amount of the asset to be distributed as of the end of the reporting period; and</li>
    <li>the fair value of the asset to be distributed as of the end of the reporting period, if it is different from its carrying amount, and the information about the method(s) used to measure that fair value required by IFRS 13, paragraphs 93(b), (d), (g) and (i) and 99?</li>
</ul>
    [29] => <b>Dividends</b>
    [30] => Are the following disclosed:
<ul>
    <li>The amount of dividend recognised as a distribution to owners (i.e. equity dividends) and the related amount of dividend per share;</li>
    <li>The amount of dividends proposed or declared before the financial statements were authorised for issue but not recognised as a distribution to owners during the period, and the related amount per share; and</li>
    <li>The amount of any cumulative preference dividends not recognised?</li>
</ul>
    [31] => <b>Ultimate Controlling Party and Parent Undertakings Disclosures </b>
    [32] => Do the notes disclose who:
<ul>
    <li>The ultimate controlling party is;</li>
    <li>The immediate parent undertaking is;</li>
    <li>The ultimate parent undertaking is?</li>
</ul>
    [33] => If neither the entity’s parent, nor the ultimate controlling party produces consolidated financial statements available for public use, has the name of the next most senior parent that does been disclosed?
    [34] => Where the parent undertaking or ultimate controlling party has changed since the reporting date, has this been disclosed?
    [35] => <b>Related Party Disclosures</b>
    [36] => Where related party transaction exist have the following been disclosed (as a <b>minimum</b>):
<ul>
    <li>The amount of the transactions;</li>
    <li>The amount of outstanding balances (including commitments);</li>
    <li>Regarding the outstanding balance (including commitments), have the terms and conditions been disclosed, including:</li>
    <li>Whether the balances are secured;</li>
    <li>The nature of the consideration to be provided in settlement;</li>
    <li>Details of whether any guarantees were given or received.</li>
    <li>Provisions regarding outstanding debit balances; and</li>
    <li>The bad debt expense recognised during the period?</li>
</ul>
    [37] => Have amounts incurred by the entity for the provision of key management services that are provided by a separate management entity been separately disclosed?
<p>Unless separate disclosure is needed to understand the effects of related party transactions, transactions which are similar in nature can be aggregated where they relate to similar related parties.</p>
<p>IAS 24 requires separate disclosure for each of the following categories of related party, has this disclosure been given:</p>
<ul>
    <li>The parent;</li>
    <li>Entities with joint control or significant influence over the entity;</li>
    <li>Subsidiaries;</li>
    <li>Associates;</li>
    <li>Joint ventures in which the entity is a joint venturer;</li>
    <li>Key management personnel of the entity or its parent; and</li>
    <li>Other related parties?</li>
</ul>
<p>NB: Regarding similar transactions, IAS 24 gives the following examples where aggregation could occur:</p>
<ul>
    <li>Purchases or sales of goods (finished or unfinished); </li>
    <li>Purchases or sales of property and other assets;</li>
    <li>Rendering or receiving services;</li>
    <li>Leases;</li>
    <li>Transfers of R&D;</li>
    <li>Transfers under licence agreements;</li>
    <li>Transfers under finance agreements (including loans and equity contributions in the form of cash or in kind);</li>
    <li>Provision of guarantees or collateral;</li>
    <li>Commitments to do something if a particular event occurs or does not occur in the future, including executory contracts (recognised and unrecognised);</li>
    <li>Settlement of liabilities on behalf of the entity or on behalf of another party; and</li>
    <li>Participation by a parent or subsidiary in a defined benefit plan where risks are shared between group entities</li>
</ul>
    [38] => <b>Government-Related Entities and Related Party Disclosures</b>
<p>A reporting entity is exempt from disclosing related party transactions and balances (including commitments) with:</p>
<ul>
    <li>A government that has control or joint control of; or significant influence over the reporting entity; and</li>
    <li>Another entity that is a related party because the same government has control or joint control of, or significant influence over, both the reporting entity and the other entity.</li>
</ul>
    [39] => Where these exemptions are taken advantage of, are the following disclosed:
<ul>
    <li>The name of the government;</li>
    <li>The nature of the relationship; and</li>
    <li>The following information in sufficient detail to enable users of the entity’s financial statement to understand the effect of related party transactions including:-
        <ul>
            <li>The nature and amount of each individually significant transactions; and</li>
            <li>For other transactions that are collectively, but not individually significant, a qualitative or quantitative indication of their extent?</li>
        </ul>
    </li>
</ul>
<p>IAS 24.27 gives additional guidance.</p>
    [40] => <b>Capital Management</b>
    [41] => Has adequate disclosure been given to allow an evaluation of the entity’s objectives, policies and processes for managing capital?
<p>To comply with IAS 1, paragraph 134, the following disclosures should be given:</p>
<ol type="a">
    <li>A description of what the entity manages as capital;</li>
    <li>When an entity is subject to externally imposed capital requirements, the nature of those requirements and how those requirements are incorporated into the management of capital;</li>
    <li>How it is meeting its objectives for managing capital;</li>
    <li>Summary quantitative data about what it manages as capital;</li>
    <li>Any changes in (a) to (d) from the previous period;</li>
    <li>Whether, during the period, externally imposed capital requirements were complied with and where not, the consequences of such non-compliance.</li>
</ol>
<p>NB: These disclosures should be based on the information provided internally to key management personnel</p>
<p>NB: Where an entity has a number of different ways of measuring capital or is subject to a number of different external capital requirement, information may only be given on an aggregate basis if it would still be meaningful.</p>
)
